title: Inches to Picas Converter (in ⇄ picas ⇄ points)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: PostScript / DTP: 1 in = 72 pt 1 pica = 12 pt So: 1 in = 72 ÷ 12 = 6 picas picas = inches × 6 points = inches × 72

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
